subject: Re: erro with Select your continent
body:
On 6/25/07, Rodrigo Tavares  wrote:
snip
> Select your continent (or several nearby continents)
> []
> Sorry! since you don't have any existing picks, you
> must make a
> geographic selection.
snip

There should be a list of continents before the [].  Are you trying to
run this on a machine that does not have net access?

--
